text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 other FIRE monster in your hand or face-up field, and if you do, add 1 FIRE Beast, Beast-Warrior or Winged Beast monster from your Deck to your hand, except “Fire King Consort Ulkanix”, then you can make the Level of this card become the Level of that monster added to the hand. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 “Fire King High Avatar Garunix” from your Deck in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Fire King Consort Ulkanix" once per turn.
